contact_points.description: At the center of the screwdriver handle
contact_points.usage: Primary grasp point for axial manipulation. Hold here to apply both downward pressure and torque.

functional_points.description: At the tip of the screwdriver
functional_points.usage: Axial interaction point. Requires simultaneous linear push (v_y) and rotation (Ï‰_y) along the tool's longitudinal axis to engage and drive the screw.
